mapper.select: SELECT ENTER_CD, GRCODE_CD, CODE, CODE_NM, SYMD, NOTE FROM V_IF_WTM_CODE WHERE ENTER_CD = 'BRS' AND GRCODE_CD IN ('H20010', 'H20020', 'H20030', 'H10050', 'H10110', 'T10003', 'W20010') AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD, GRCODE_CD
SELECT ENTER_CD, LOCATION_CD, YY||MM||DD AS YMD, HOLIDAY_NM, FESTIVE_YN, PAY_YN FROM V_FTM_HOLIDAY WHERE ENTER_CD = 'BRS' AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD

SELECT ENTER_CD, GNT_CD, GNT_NM, GNT_GUBUN_CD, HOL_INCL_YN, REQUEST_USE_TYPE, WORK_YN FROM V_IF_TAA_CODE WHERE ENTER_CD = 'BRS' AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD
SELECT ENTER_CD, ORG_CD, ORG_NM, SDATE, EDATE, MEMO FROM V_IF_ORG_CODE WHERE ENTER_CD = 'BRS' AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD
SELECT DISTINCT ENTER_CD, ORG_CHART_NM, SDATE, EDATE, MEMO FROM V_IF_ORG_CHART WHERE ENTER_CD = 'BRS' AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY SDATE

SELECT ENTER_CD, MAP_TYPE_CD, MAP_CD, MAP_NM, SDATE, EDATE, NOTE FROM V_IF_ORG_MAP_CODE WHERE ENTER_CD = 'BRS' AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD, MAP_TYPE_CD

SELECT ENTER_CD, SABUN, EMP_NM, EMP_ENG_NM, SYMD, STATUS_CD, ORG_CD, BUSINESS_PLACE_CD , DUTY_CD, POS_CD, CLASS_CD, JOB_GROUP_CD, JOB_CD, PAY_TYPE_CD, ORG_PATH, LEADER_YN FROM V_IF_WTM_EMPHIS WHERE ENTER_CD = 'BRS' AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD, SABUN, SYMD
